sentences.english: The boy’s hands are pulled up inside the cuffs of his shirt.
sentences.chinese: 男孩的手揣在襯衣袖口裏面。

sentences.english: They are great just to keep in your purse or diaper bag for on the go.
sentences.chinese: 在錢袋或是尿布包裏揣上一包會很方便。

sentences.english: She was trying to figure out what would happen next.
sentences.chinese: 她心裏揣想着接下去會發生什麼情況。

sentences.english: The letter has been in my pocket all the time.
sentences.chinese: 這封信一直揣在我口袋裏。

sentences.english: Author bold mean, plans to make a preliminary discussion in light of this, asks respectfully to point out mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 筆者不揣淺陋，擬就此作一初步探討，敬請指正。

sentences.english: The poet could carry all his effusions about in his pockets.
sentences.chinese: 我這個“小詩人”把所有的詩作都揣在口袋裏。

sentences.english: In their lace mitts , austere and sweet.
sentences.chinese: 揣在花邊手套裏，樸實可人。

sentences.english: The Chen Hong skill Chuai raises oil lamp down all solo in the brisket.
sentences.chinese: 沈鴻一手揣在懷裏，一手舉着油燈下來。

sentences.english: Twist one shredded paper ink, put a sentiment, in the impression the drafting of old Berlin.
sentences.chinese: 捻一紙碎墨，揣一份情愫，在印象裏起草舊時的柏林。

sentences.english: Eponine had put the letter in her pocket.
sentences.chinese: 愛潘妮卻把信揣了在她的衣袋裏。

sentences.english: It always cherishes the love for human's noble character and sterling integrity.
sentences.chinese: 始終揣懷着對人類高風亮節的愛。

sentences.english: He had but to keep this note in his pocket.
sentences.chinese: 他只消把這信揣在衣袋裏。
她把生日賀卡揣在懷裏。
